creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
description: dark stained wood box; glass front; back shellacked with newspaper; horizontal drawer along bottom; inside box 5 footed shot glasses secured in recessed holes; yellow and clear marble in PR glass; orange and clear marble and portion of dried organic sea matter in glass 2nd from PR; wood dowel in center glass; blue and clear marble in glass 2nd from PL; yellow and clear marble and narrow piece of paper with '140' in red in PL glass; metal rod across top with 2 wood pieces painted white hanging from rod with metal loops; PR piece has illustration of celestial bodies glued to the face; PL wood piece has hole drilled through it; inside of box lined with white-washed numerical charts; black map of stars on back wall; black and red illustration of celestial bodies on PL side inside box; inside bottom drawer blue sand; clear rock, 2 clear marbles and 3 ball bearings, all unattached; glass over top of drawer painted with white lines
medium: wood, paper, glass, pigment, metal, marbles, sand, organic matter, screws, nails
title: Astrological Box
